Description: Hand-made pottery: Tel el-Yahudiyeh ware juglet with piriform body, narrow neck with everted ring rim and button base; incised decoration and black slip
Bibliographic references: Vase / Catalogue of Vases in the British Museum (C104)
Malmgren 2003 / Klavdhia-Tremithos. A Middle and Late Cypriote Bronze Age site. (no. 27, p. 32)
Kaplan 1980 / The Origin and Distribution of Tell el Yahudiyeh Ware. (p. 162, fig. 101c)
SCE IV/1B / The Swedish Cyprus Expedition. Vol. IV/ 1B The Middle Cypriot Bronze Age (p. 131, type I, A, 1, a)
Kiely 2011d / Klavdia-Tremithos: A Bronze Age community in south-east Cyprus (A29.1)
